name: Casino Classics Slots
description:
Development Currently in Progress.

My entry for Mini Jam 93: Vacation.

My concept for the project was to create a small casino game that takes place at an island casino. The initial plan was to have a small casino map the player could walk though, and a couple casino games they can play. All graphics and sounds were also created by me.

Time restraints have made it so that I will probably only be able to have 1-2 slot games available, and possibly the casino map if there is extra.

I achieved creating a working slot machine that takes bets and pays out based on winning combinations. On the side I also wrote a Python program that allowed me to make the slot probabilities  close to actual casinos... though my machine pays out more :p

I may expand the after the jam so it can be what I initially planned depending on if people enjoy it.
